mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( post_no, title, text_md, text_html, category, member_email ) VALUES ( post_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{textMd}, #{textHtml}, #{category}, #{memberEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT post_no AS postNo, title AS title, text_md AS textMd, text_html AS textHtml, read_cnt AS readCnt, like_cnt AS likeCnt, hate_cnt AS hateCnt, category AS category, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS regDt, mod_dt AS modDt, member_email AS memberEmail FROM post WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, text_md = #{textMd}, text_html = #{textHtml}, category = #{category}, mod_dt = sysdate WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
